mapper.select: select sg.goods_name as goodsName, sg.icon as icon, sg.points as points, sg.goods_no as goodsNo, sg.goods_num-sg.goods_frozen_num as goodsUsableNum from sb_goods sg inner join sb_product_goods spg on spg.goods_id =sg.id inner join sb_product sp on sp.id =spg.product_id where sp.product_no=#{activityCode}
